MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA2 postcode area of Kilmarnock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.08pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10PM on Thursday 14 January 2021.
